name: 1-Bit Loneliness by Joseph Horak
description:
A short platformer where you play as a small creature in a lonely world. Keep moving and you might find what you're looking for.

Jump, run, climb, and push boxes in order to complete the 5 levels. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

Space to jump

Space repeatedly on walls to climb

##########################

Game Mechanic Code by Michael Baker

Game made in Unity by Joseph Horak

Music made in SonicPi by Joseph Horak

Art made in Marmoset Hexels 3 by Joseph Horak
